definitions.definition: An object or person who spreads .
A spacer or device for keeping two objects apart .
A device used to spread bulk material.
examples: Ellen put grass seed on the lawn with a seed spreader .

definitions.definition: A knife or spatula used to distribute a substance such as butter or jelly .
examples: James used a spreader to butter her bagel.

definitions.definition: A horizontal athwartships spar attached to the mast of a sailboat in order to extend the shrouds away from the mast.
A machine for combining and drawing fibers of flax to form a sliver preparatory to spinning.
The moving platform of a container crane .
A member of a cracking group who distributes warez .

main_definition: An object or person who spreads .
secondary_definitions: A spacer or device for keeping two objects apart .
A device used to spread bulk material.
A knife or spatula used to distribute a substance such as butter or jelly .
( nautical ) A horizontal athwartships spar attached to the mast of a sailboat in order to extend the shrouds away from the mast.
A machine for combining and drawing fibers of flax to form a sliver preparatory to spinning.
The moving platform of a container crane .
( computing , slang ) A member of a cracking group who distributes warez .
